description.@en: Whether on parade, participating in competitive sports or during times of war, you have mastered the art of equestrianism. This mastery is unparalleled, dwarfed only by your contemporaries whom taught you to ride.

effect.@en: When you fail a Handle Animal or Ride Test, you may re-roll to generate a better result, but must accept the outcome. In addition, when using the Movement subtype of Ride, you do not have to add the additional 1 AP cost.
